net.javachallenge.api

Class ComputerPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.javachallenge.api.ComputerPlayer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MockPlayer

    public abstract class ComputerPlayer
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class which represents an AI player. Please extend this class for developing your AI player.

    • Method Detail

      • saveTemporalCommands

        public final void saveTemporalCommands(java.util.List<Command> commands)
        Saves the temporal commands for controlling your player. Note that the temporal commands are accepted when your AI program does not decide the commands within the limiting time (1000 ms).
        Parameters:
        commands - the temporal commands to save

      • getTemporalCommands

        public final Command[] getTemporalCommands()
        Returns the saved temporal commands.
        Returns:
        the saved temporal commands

      • saveTemporalVeinLocation

        public final void saveTemporalVeinLocation(TrianglePoint location)
        Saves the temporal vein location to occupy first for selecting your vein. Note that the temporal vein location is accepted when your AI program does not decide the vein location within the limiting time (10000[ms]).
        Parameters:
        location - the temporal vein location to save

      • getTemporalVeinLocation

        public final TrianglePoint getTemporalVeinLocation()
        Returns the saved temporal vein location to occupy first.
        Returns:
        the saved temporal vein location to occupy first

      • selectVein

        public abstract TrianglePoint selectVein(Game game)
        Returns the selected vein location to occupy first. This method should terminate within 10000[ms]. The saved temporal vein location is used when this method exceed the limiting time. Note that the vein location are selected irresponsibly when an invalid vein location is selected.
        Parameters:
        game - the Game instance of the current turn
        Returns:
        the selected vein location to occupy first

      • selectActions

        public abstract java.util.List<Command> selectActions(Game game)
        Returns the decided command list to control your player. This method should terminate within 10000[ms]. The saved temporal command list is used when this method exceed the limiting time. Note that the command to do nothing is accepted when an invalid or empty command is decided. Invalid commands are ignored, i.e. skipped to execute next commands in the command list.
        Parameters:
        game - the Game instance of the current turn
        Returns:
        the decided command list to control your player

      • getName

        public abstract java.lang.String getName()
        Return the team name.
        Returns:
        the team name
